In England, in the seven days to 01 October, there were 50,317 new confirmed cases (89.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 September, there were 41,297 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 22% (9,020 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 October is 20,027,667 (35,415.8 cases per 100,000 population).
